content: शिष् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (शेषति) To hurt, kill. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (शेषति, शेषयति-ते) To leave as a remainder, spare. {vIII.v} {c7c} <ab>P.</ab> (शिनष्टि, शिष्ट) {@--1@} To leave as a remainder, leave, leave remaining. {@--2@} To distinguish or discriminate from others. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (शेषयति-ते) To leave &c.
